item.description:
THE DATE OF THE EVENT IS JANUARY 10 SUNDAY AT 1:00 PM. Location,Food, Cost Info Below.



THE IRA’S SINGLES EVENTS FIRST ANNUAL

Post-Holiday Bad Gifts SALE OR EXCHANGE PARTY (What is worse- a bad gift or a bad date? Answer- A bad gift given by a bad date)



A Prize will be given to the Worst Date Story shared with all, if so desired.



If you send to me items that you are interested in buying, selling, exchanging I will put on a master sheet, and send out to all those coming a week before the event. For example, I am looking to buy a 17 - pc. Magic Bullet Blender. Does anyone have?



BARTER: I will also keep a master list of those who want to barter for services. Example: I am in need of a person to replace 2 Faucets; I will in exchange my services for a complete car detailing service that I offer.

Plus Single mingling at its best!!!!!!!

AND

A 50 - 50 Raffle to help the winner with the next credit card bill that will come in from the Holiday Gift Shopping Season.

$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

Thinks of this party as fun indoor tag sale and a chance to sell or trade those unwanted Christmas and Hanukkah gifts. It can be one gift or many. It does not have to be a Holiday Gift, any item/s in you home that you want to trade, or sale. If you do not have anything to bring, please do join just the fun of the event and the Single Mingling at its best!!!!! Have lunch, Have a Cocktail……….



This is sure to be an event that will have you laughing all the way through the night and maybe to the bank!!

Sell that baked ham, or trade it for a crazy tie, exchange Aunt Stella’s fruitcake for a bottle of Old Spice or Jean Nate.

You get the idea. These are the unwanted gifts that end up at tag sales in the spring. But why wait, when you can rid yourself of bad gifts now. What you hate, someone else might love.

BUY

SELL
EXCHANGE/TRADE

DEVELOP A BARTER NETWORK.


Who knows? Maybe you’ll exchange a phone number or email address as well…Now that would be the best present for sure!!



I will have many tables set up to place your presents on. Please mark your name and price on each item, or indicate on the items if you are willing to trade or exchange them for something else.

THE FINE PRINT



DATE:

JANUARY 10 2010. SUNDAY 1:00PM







LOCATION:



Clarion Inn and Suites, 161 Bridge Street. East Windsor CT. 06088. 860-623-9411

( VERY EASY TO GET TO: 2 SECONDS FROM EXIT 45 OFF OFF 91. 91 NORTH, EXIT 45, TAKE LEFT, ON LEFT. 91 SOUTH EXIT 45. TAKE RIGHT, ON LEFT IN ONE SECOND)



The FOOD INFO:



(The Chef is Outstanding. He is preparing the following for our Parta)



Chef’s Special Chicken- YUM



Pasta Marinara- DELCIOUS



Garden Salad- HEALTHY AND GREEN

Assorted cold sandwiches- TASTY WITH VARIETY

Soup of the Day – Chef’s Selection- HOT AND SMOOTH

Assorted Desserts- Our Chef will decide.

For those that would like- Well Bloody Mary’s and Mimosas at $5.00 per Drink. Cash Bar.

COST FOR THE ABOVE IS ONLY $14.95!

HOW CAN YOU COMPLAIN ABOUT THAT?



R.S.V.P:

DEADLINE DATE: January 7. Thursday 9:00AM.

Please send to : Mistrchrming@aol.com. 860-604-5792. Ira
item.how_to_find_us: Large Sign for Our Meet Up Group showing location of Event

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!
